meanings.definition: relating to or denoting a method of radio reception in which incoming signals are mixed with a locally generated signal to produce a lower frequency signal for amplification
meanings.sent1: The superheterodyne radio system helped improve signal quality.
meanings.sent2: The technician explained how the superheterodyne process works.
meanings.sent3: The superheterodyne method made the radio waves dance to a new tune.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a superheterodyne receiver, filtering out the noise to focus on the melody.
meanings.sent5: The superheterodyne concept was as clear as a bell, ringing through the airwaves.

meanings.definition: a device or circuit that uses the superheterodyne method of reception
meanings.sent1: The superheterodyne in the radio helped tune in to different stations.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the superheterodyne to get a stronger signal.
meanings.sent3: The superheterodyne device seemed to have a mind of its own, picking up signals from afar.
meanings.sent4: The superheterodyne was like a wizard, magically transforming signals into music.
meanings.sent5: With the superheterodyne, the radio became a gateway to a world of sounds.
